segments.text: Take me to the railroad station . Can you put my baggage in the trunk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . But let me park my car in a better position . All right , miss . Where are the bags ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a lot . What did you bring with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're just gifts I bought . Don't worry . They are not heavy .
segments.speaker: S2
